price: Ìṣe Allāhu, èyí tó ti ṣẹlẹ̀ ṣíwájú (ni èyí). O ò sì níí rí ìyípadà fún ìṣe Allāhu (lórí àwọn ọ̀tá Rẹ̀).
arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: sunnata al-lahi allatī qad khalat min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdīlan
